riskModels.gamedriver

Class StartupPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • riskModels.gamedriver.StartupPhase

  • public class StartupPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class initialises the Players data and assign countries with armies. Basically, all the necessary setup/startup requirements are met before actually playing the game.
    Author:
    Akshay
